fields.Title: LAIR / INSTIGATOR
fields.Description:
You are caught in the ray of the Pale Compressor and talk to Ruby. You can:
1. Ask about the Compressor.
2. Ask about the murder and why Ruby went into hiding.
3. Try to destroy the Compressor.
4. Try to stop Ruby from killing herself if you destroy the Compressor.
5. Let Ruby go.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Her tone is bitter. She thinks she'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her tone is bitter. She thinks she's been betrayed.

fields.Title: You: ""Who was in this... squad?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who was in this... squad?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You know."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know.

fields.Title: You: ""I did my best.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did my best."

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks." (Rub your temples.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks." (Rub your temples.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her tent. We should check it out."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Her tent. We should check it out." He points to the back of the cavern.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She looks at the machine, assessing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She looks at the machine, assessing the damage. Her hand trembles.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh." She smiles sadly. "Well, I gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh." She smiles sadly. "Well, I guess I always knew she was a *survivor* above all else."

fields.Title: Variable["boardwalk.ruby_suggestion_malice"]
Variable["boardwalk.ruby_suggestion_malice"]
!(Variable["boardwalk.ruby_suggestion_malice"])
You: ""What's this goddamned *pale* anywa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's this goddamned *pale* anyway?"

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Precisely. This is an industrial-s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Precisely. This is an industrial-strength paraboloid. It's meant for forcing dimensions on something that doesn't *have* them. Needless to say, the frequencies used are... out of this world."

fields.Title: You: ""Will I stay like this forever?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Will I stay like this forever?"

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I was listening in on their freque..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was listening in on their frequency." She pauses, biting her lip. "Even though those assholes gave me up... I'm worried for the boys."

fields.Title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""875263... 23621837... for that spe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "875263... 23621837... for that special someone..."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Problem-solving," she mutters."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Problem-solving," she mutters.

fields.Title: You: "I was drunk! I didn't mean it!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I was drunk! I didn't mean it!...

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sure I'm supposed to know... b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sure I'm supposed to know... but I lost my memory recently."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, of course. Are you... *scared..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, of course. Are you... *scared* yet?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, the ones you poached from Ti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, the ones you poached from Titus. And Titus himself."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "No, wait, finally, it comes to you,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, wait, finally, it comes to you, a way to connect with her:

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""And potentially bring attention to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And potentially bring attention to herself? No. Besides, the shot was made from a distance -- otherwise we would have heard it downstairs."
fields.Alternate1: "As I keep telling you cops, we didn't hear anything downstairs. No gunshot, nothing."

fields.Title: Jump to: [pre_ruby_main]
Jump to: [Pale Latitude Compressor: ""875263... 23621837... for that spe..."]
Esprit de Corps: "You should probably check on Kim. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should probably check on Kim. It doesn't sound like he's doing all too well.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Well, it doesn't *feel* much better..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well, it doesn't *feel* much better, but you can form sentences now. Thinking doesn't seem to hurt as much.

fields.Title: You: ""Shower head? Resourceful...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shower head? Resourceful..."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Everyone in Jamrock. The cops, the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everyone in Jamrock. The cops, the criminals... Why do you think I'm holed up in here with a goddamn death ray, waiting for you?"

fields.Title: Logic: "If she knows *that* about you, she..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If she knows *that* about you, she must know your real name too.

fields.Title: Half Light: "I don't know... sounds pretty convi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't know... sounds pretty convincing to me.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? That's... your takeaway? I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really? That's... your takeaway? I'm *certain* she didn't do it." He looks around, then points to the back of the cavern. "Her tent. We should check it out."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All things considered..." The lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All things considered..." The lieutenant is still reeling from the pain. "...that could've gone worse."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I don't think she did it... Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I don't think she did it... She's someone else's case now."

fields.Title: Jump to: [endhub]
Pain Threshold: "The violent white noise becomes eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The violent white noise becomes even more overwhelming closer to the Compressor. Feels like your brain is swelling up in your skull.
fields.Sequence: BanishInterface(true)@1; PlayAnimation(Tequila Sunset,InstigatorFailure)@1; FadeToImage(Redness)@6;HideOverlay()@7.5; Release()@7.5;  BanishInterface(false)@7.5;

fields.Title: You: ""Help, Kim, help! My brain's on fir..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Help, Kim, help! My brain's on fire!"

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No, I didn't do it. I only helped..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I didn't do it. I only helped stage the lynching. Though I doubt that makes much of a difference to *you*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mmm..." The lieutenant clutches hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mmm..." The lieutenant clutches his head as his eyes roll back into his skull.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: "You're overwhelmed with a new surge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're overwhelmed with a new surge of violent static. It feels like a blood vessel exploded in your brain.

Ruby, the Instigator: "She looks at you incredulously. "Wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She looks at you incredulously. "What? I don't even understand what you're trying to get at here."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She pauses, taking it in. "Well, fu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She pauses, taking it in. "Well, fuck. And those guys *liked* me -- I know it. If this is what happens to people whom people like..."

Perception (Hearing): "It's like a thousand radio stations..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's like a thousand radio stations are being blasted into your head all at once, but her words are the only ones you can make out.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Goddamnit." She regards you and Ki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamnit." She regards you and Kim with sudden sympathy.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "She's carrying a two-barrelled fron..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's carrying a two-barrelled front-loader. Remain careful.

Untitled hub (04)
Inland Empire: "There was a longing in her for some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There was a longing in her for some sort of denouement, but it's unlikely that it was this... turning prematurely grey while being escorted from interrogation room to interrogation room...

fields.Title: You: ""Kim! Kim! Make it stop!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim! Kim! Make it stop!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [rubymainhub]
Jump to: [rubymainhub]
Esprit de Corps: ""Let's go home, Jean. Nothing's goi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go home, Jean. Nothing's going to happen today," she responds quietly. Jean takes his blond wig off. "Call Heidelstam. He can give us a ride."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I would have done the same..." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would have done the same..." He has to catch his breath. "Had I not been incapacitated..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He squints into the darkness, "that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He squints into the darkness, "that tent there."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Klaasje didn't want to turn the lam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Klaasje didn't want to turn the lamp on. She was afraid of another shot.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh yeah. *Super*. But I didn't thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yeah. *Super*. But I didn't think too much of it at first -- I'd seen her party hard before."

fields.Title: You: ""That's all... thank you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all... thank you."

fields.Title: Pale Latitude Compressor: "Hhhhhhhhzzzzzzzzzzz.......... frict..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hhhhhhhhzzzzzzzzzzz.......... friction lock set.. Zzzzzzzzzzz... Don't leave me here, please Celice!

fields.Title: Pale Latitude Compressor: "Hhhhhhhzzzzzzz... L'Iramburde: star..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hhhhhhhzzzzzzz... L'Iramburde: starbursts and sunshine. 24 degrees centigrade...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "This *is* how you talk her out of i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This *is* how you talk her out of it. It's the only scenario in which she lives.

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck." The lieutenant stands, moti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck." The lieutenant stands, motionless, watching the blood pool in the sand.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lieutenant-yefreitor Du Bois," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant-yefreitor Du Bois," he intones. "Control your emotions. We did our *job*. This won't be the worst thing that happens on this case... believe me. You can't let this break you."

fields.Title: Logic: "This must be how the twins heard th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This must be how the twins heard the radio in their heads. They must have been standing by when she tested it.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Who ratted me out, by the way? Was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who ratted me out, by the way? Was it Titus? No," she hesitates, "he wouldn't have broken first..."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Can't say it's a pleasure, officer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can't say it's a pleasure, officer. I was really hoping *not* to make your acquaintance. But -- here we are. "

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""That boy's really gotta learn to k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That boy's really gotta learn to keep his trap shut. And it's not a bloody pale emitter. It doesn't emit *pale*..."

fields.Title: You: ""Did you shoot Lely?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you shoot Lely?"
fields.Alternate1: "I still have a *case* to make... let's continue..."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Alright, don't kill yourself over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, don't kill yourself over it. I was shooting the shit with Hardie and the boys over a few beers, like always. Then Klaasje comes in, all pale and shuddering..."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I know it's bad -- try not to move.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know it's bad -- try not to move."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm guessing you don't know that a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm guessing you don't know that a third mercenary has come to town just in time for the tribunal -- now you do."

fields.Title: You: ""Ruby boys... Formerly the Hardie b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ruby boys... Formerly the Hardie boys."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, I wasn't sure whether to adm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, I wasn't sure whether to admire her -- or be disturbed."

fields.Title: You: ""Klaasje. She's clearly a gender tr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Klaasje. She's clearly a gender traitor."

fields.Title: You: ""You're using one of those devices..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're using one of those devices used to send signals through the pale on me!"

fields.Title: Variable["boardwalk.ruby_greet_kim_endurance"]
Variable["boardwalk.ruby_greet_kim_endurance"]
!(Variable["boardwalk.ruby_greet_kim_endurance"])
Jump to: [Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah? What?""]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer... what are you doing, you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer... what are you doing, you..."

fields.Title: Half Light: "That strange distant fear is gettin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That strange distant fear is getting close now. It's a fear -- of *yourself.*

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "That's an awful decision. Why would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's an awful decision. Why would you not want to shield yourself from it? It's an entirely *new* type of experience -- way worse than all the previous ones.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "As opposed to the other knives she'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As opposed to the other knives she's finding there now. Hardie, for one.

fields.Title: You: ""Preparing for the... worst?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Preparing for the... worst?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It was dark in the shack. The waves..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was dark in the shack. The waves outside had calmed down. She looked at the loaded gun, then she cracked the barrel open and took the bullet out. Not today.

fields.Title: Composure: "You can see it: her lips, though st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can see it: her lips, though still white, don't seem to tremble as much anymore. She moves with focus and deliberation.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Harry Du Bois," she replies quickl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Harry Du Bois," she replies quickly. "One corrupt motherfucker with the disco pants and the funny tie. Agent to La Puta Madre."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Wait, one thing. Possibly small but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, one thing. Possibly small but -- she said *you* rolled into town. Was that 'you' singular or plural? She might know something...

fields.Title: You: ""No... that doesn't ring any bells.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No... that doesn't ring any bells."

fields.Title: You: "It's too late..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's too late...

fields.Title: You: ""Wait... shouldn't we go after her?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait... shouldn't we go after her?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her tent! Maybe there's something..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Her tent! Maybe there's something in there."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "There is no coming back from this o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no coming back from this one. It will stay with you -- in nightmares.

fields.Title: You: ""Klaasje found it... weird you came..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Klaasje found it... weird you came up with a plan so quickly."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What bunker?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What bunker?"

fields.Title: You: ""Klaasje... said you knew something..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Klaasje... said you knew something was wrong immediately."

fields.Title: You: ""Have you... *experienced* the comp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you... *experienced* the compressor yourself?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm no one's... agent. I don't eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm no one's... agent. I don't even know who La Puta Madre is!"

fields.Title: You: ""La Puta Madre... I've heard of La..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "La Puta Madre... I've heard of La Puta Madre... He's dangerous... right?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [rubymainhub]
You: ""What are you *doing*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you *doing*?"

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: "You watch as her brains trickle out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You watch as her brains trickle out through her neon hair.

fields.Title: You: ""Titus told me. It took some convin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus told me. It took some convincing..."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""...how the fuck do the rest of you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...how the fuck do the rest of you get by?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "Taking out a knife, he crouches at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Taking out a knife, he crouches at the end of one flower bed. He scores a seedpod, very gently. Milky sap begins to ooze out. The pain comes over you again...

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, wasn't it... you who called..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, wasn't it... you who called me the *human can opener*? It's not personal. I... opened them up."

fields.Title: Logic: "Blasted from that pale emitter Fat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Blasted from that pale emitter Fat Angus mentioned.

fields.Title: You: ""Please, could you just turn it dow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please, could you just turn it down... so I can... ask you something?" (Move on.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [rubymainhub]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmgh... she's right. No one mentio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmgh... she's right. No one mentioned *hearing*... shots. I... the shot didn't come from the roof."

fields.Title: You: ""We arrested her... consider yourse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We arrested her... consider yourself avenged."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm sad to hear that. The girl was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sad to hear that. The girl was playing some dangerous games, but even with what she did to me... I wouldn't have wished *that* upon her."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "So this is what she was scared to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So this is what she was scared to tell Titus. *This cop, this cop...*

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""So you found my shack, huh? I'm no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you found my shack, huh? I'm not surprised."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I did, didn't I. And now you've co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did, didn't I. And now you've come for me." She scoffs. "But fuck them all the same."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Well, this has been a great talk,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, this has been a great talk, really. But I think I'm going to hit the road now."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Tribunal? What tribunal?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Tribunal? What tribunal?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "It's too late now anyway. She's gon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's too late now anyway. She's gone.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub]
Logic: "This must be how the twins heard th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This must be how the twins heard the radio in their heads. They must have been standing by when she tested it.

fields.Title: You: ""When I threatened to arrest her, K..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When I threatened to arrest her, Klaasje broke... she told me everything."

fields.Title: Half Light: "She looks shaken. She wasn't surpri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She looks shaken. She wasn't surprised to be ratted out -- but *framed*?

fields.Title: You: "Squirm in pain."
fields.Dialogue Text: Squirm in pain.

Variable["tc.seraise_giant_hornet"]
!(Variable["tc.seraise_giant_hornet"])
Ruby, the Instigator: "She pulls the trigger before you fi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She pulls the trigger before you finish your sentence.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She flashes you an incredulous grin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She flashes you an incredulous grin. Then she exhales sharply, shakes her head, and pulls the trigger.

fields.Title: Authority: "Even now, Kim is a paragon of profe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even now, Kim is a paragon of professionalism: he's trying to make a clean cut of telling her she was betrayed.

You: "What happens when it *really* start..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What happens when it *really* starts?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Yes, but even in this anguish you c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, but even in this anguish you can't see its precise shape. It's *unimaginable* for a reason.

fields.Title: You: ""It didn't help her. She was a... f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It didn't help her. She was a... fugitive. We took her in."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh, I wouldn't have wished that up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, I wouldn't have wished that upon her... The girl was playing some dangerous games, but even with what she did to me... I wouldn't have wished *that* upon her."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "We should've factored this in. Damn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We should've factored this in. Damn it.

fields.Title: Volition: "Klaasje knew exactly what she was d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Klaasje knew exactly what she was doing. You can't remain calm under pressure otherwise.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She smiles bitterly. "Nah, she didn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She smiles bitterly. "Nah, she didn't crack. She's a survivor. If she told you anything, it was to save herself..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "That did make her forgive them -- a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That did make her forgive them -- a little.

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me, what's my name? If you kn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me, what's my name? If you know... that about me, you must... know my name."

fields.Title: You: ""What did we just do?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What did we just do?"

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
You: ""Who killed the merc... if it wasn'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who killed the merc... if it wasn't you?"

fields.Title: ulanfrequencystuff
Ruby, the Instigator: ""I built it myself." She nods towar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I built it myself." She nods toward her torture device.

fields.Title: Shivers: "A man in a white suit walks through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A man in a white suit walks through a garden coaxed from soil that had once been covered in asphalt -- a city block closed off from the rest of the city by dark buildings.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Is that a joke or a threat? I'm gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that a joke or a threat? I'm guessing both."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""...war?" She purses her lips. "The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...war?" She purses her lips. "The thought crossed my mind. But the mercenary's death was going to have repercussions either way. Although, the way things are going..."

fields.Title: Drama: "She doesn't want to talk about this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She doesn't want to talk about this, but not because she has something to hide -- she doesn't want the guilt.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm asking myself that right now t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm asking myself that right now too. Anyway, I'm guessing you don't know that a third mercenary has come to town just in time for the tribunal -- now you do."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""As I said -- watch out." She nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As I said -- watch out." She nods.

fields.Title: You: "I can't stop her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I can't stop her...

fields.Title: You: "Come on, one idea, I need one idea!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Come on, one idea, I need one idea!

fields.Title: You: ""*Please*, turn it off! I can't tak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Please*, turn it off! I can't take it anymore!" (Move on.)

fields.Title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""236189281... If you're looking for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "236189281... If you're looking for a deal on mattresses... SUHSUHSUHSPEEDFRRRR... 23567... 32971047302819... O' strange light, O' light of mine.."

fields.Title: You: "And then? The Unimaginable Event?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And then? The Unimaginable Event?

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She frowns. "She had some pretty me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She frowns. "She had some pretty messed up people after her. She's going to come out of that meat grinder a different person... If she comes out at all."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "She'll age even faster in prison th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She'll age even faster in prison than she was partying. A pity.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: "Suddenly, your entire body is paral..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Suddenly, your entire body is paralysed. Aggressive white noise fills your skull -- a strange pain like you've never felt before. The static overcomes you.

Visual Calculus: "There's only three metres between y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's only three metres between you and the machine. If you keep her distracted for long enough, maybe...

fields.Title: You: ""You're... desperate, aren't you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're... desperate, aren't you?"

fields.Title: You: ""It was your girlfriend. She cracke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was your girlfriend. She cracked."

fields.Title: Composure: "Her neck and shoulders relax, and h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her neck and shoulders relax, and her grip on the gun loosens.

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Glad to have been of assistance."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Glad to have been of assistance." She tosses her head back defiantly and turns down the machine. "Best of luck to you, officers -- Revachol's a bitch."

fields.Title: You: ""How did you manage to... come up w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you manage to... come up with a plan? So quickly?"

fields.Title: You: ""Go ahead, then." (Let her do it.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go ahead, then." (Let her do it.)

fields.Dialogue Text: "A pale latitude compressor is used to sort of... make the pale more manageable. With a lot of these, you can force a radio signal grid on the pale -- literally crunch the distance across it."

fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry... I know I'm supposed to know all about... this, but I lost my memory recently..."

fields.Dialogue Text: "Who hasn't?" She shrugs. "You know, I can still see him there, in Klaasje's room, lying on his side."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""At the upper limit is the large pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At the upper limit is the large prime number generator station. It's used specifically for pale latitude compression. That's why you may be hearing some numbers. But you might also hear -- or think you're hearing -- local radio chatter."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Now they're going to put on a show..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now they're going to put on a show before meting out punishment." She pauses, biting her lip. "Even though those assholes gave me up... I'm worried for the boys."

fields.Title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What shit?" She adjusts her grip o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What shit?" She adjusts her grip on her gun. "I told you I didn't do it. Sounds pretty simple to me."
